description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record. The CLM_VALUES_5 table holds claim-level values set by the system during claims processing or by user edits.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim value record

columns.name: FHIR_GROUP_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: The bulk FHIR group ID for which the claim was received.

columns.name: DEPT_ALT_CODE
columns.description: This item stores the alternate code for the department. The alternate code comes from MPI.   For Norway, this item stores the IK44 code.

columns.name: PAYER_ENTERPRISE_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: Patient's enterprise ID assigned by the payer.

columns.name: ATT_PROV_SPECIALTY
columns.description: The specialty of the attending provider.

columns.name: NON_PAYMENT_RSN_DESC
columns.description: Claim level denial reason code description.

columns.name: CARRIER_PAYMENT_DNL_CD
columns.description: Carrier claim payment denial code.

columns.name: NON_PAYMENT_RSN_CD
columns.description: Claim level denial reason code.

columns.name: CARRIER_PAYMENT_DNL_DESC
columns.description: Carrier claim payment denial code description.

columns.name: BCDA_GROUP_IDENT
columns.description: Claim Group Identifier provided by Beneficiary Claims Data API

columns.name: PRIMARY_PAYER_CD
columns.description: Code used to determine if Medicare was the primary payer of this claim.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_SPEC_CODE_SET
columns.description: Stores the code set for the Billing Provider Specialty Code.

columns.name: OPER_PROV_TAXONOMY
columns.description: Holds the Operating Provider Taxonomy Code for a claim.

columns.name: PREDETERMIN_IDENT
columns.description: This is the predetermination of benefits identifier for the claim.

columns.name: ADJ_TO_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: Holds the adjustment to claim ID for the claim received from raw data

columns.name: REV_TO_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: Holds the reversal to claim ID for the claim received from raw data

columns.name: ADJ_SEQUENCE
columns.description: Holds the adjustment sequence for the claim received from raw data

columns.name: PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The plan name from raw claims data.

columns.name: CORPORATION_NAME
columns.description: Corporation name from raw claims data.

columns.name: NETWORK_LEVEL
columns.description: Specifies the network level of the claim.

columns.name: REGION_NAME
columns.description: The name of the region associated with the claim.

columns.name: LINE_OF_BUSINESS_NAME
columns.description: The name of the line of business associated with the claim.

columns.name: SVC_PROV_IN_NETWORK
columns.description: This value indicates if the service provider / pharmacy is in-network.

columns.name: MEDICARE_DRUG_CVG_CODE
columns.description: Identifies if a claim was processed under the Medicare Part B benefit or Part D benefit.
